Presentation on Enketo for Humanitarian Nomad 2013

I had the opportunity to remotely present Enketo Smart Paper during the Humanitarian Nomad workshop in Paris yesterday. A pretty cool milestone because enketo was developed specifically for humanitarian aid workers and is now robust enough to be widely deployed in the field. See the slides below.




I plan to do a lot more promotion for Enketo Smart Paper in the future and hope I can be present in person at the next Humanitarian Nomad event. Thanks to iMMAP and CartONG for leading this initiative and helping organisations find the right tool for the job with their online selection tool.
